dashboard.label: App dependencies
dashboard.description: This dashboard show apps which are recemmende or required to ensure the app is working as expected. In case an app isn't installed, the corresponding link can be found in the "splunkbase_url" column. Alternatively, go to "Apps -> Manage Apps -> Browse for more apps" and look for the title or label of the given app.

table.title: Installed, required and recommended apps. Click on a row to open the link to the addon or use the manage apps page.

search.query: | inputlookup app_dependencies | rename app_name AS title | join type=outer title [ | rest /services/apps/local | table title, label | stats values(label) AS label count by title] | eval is_installed = if(isnull(count),"false","true") | fillnull value="-" | table label, title, is_required, is_installed, splunkbase_url
